author: Andrew Beaton
title: NFL Moves to Adopt Targeting Rule
text:
ORLANDO—The NFL took a step toward adopting a “targeting” rule, with the approval of changes that toughen enforcement on hits initiated with the crown of the helmet—and an expectation that, before next season, more overhauls will be adopted to review hits that could result in a player’s ejection.
